html: A quick update on our national security leadership: Defense Secretary: Vacant. DHS Secretary: Vacant. UN Ambassador: Vacant. FEMA Director: Vacant. Secret Service Director: Vacant. ICE Director: Vacant. DHS Deputy: Vacant. President: Present, but unaccounted for.
text:
A quick update on our national security leadership:
 
Defense Secretary: Vacant.
DHS Secretary: Vacant.
UN Ambassador: Vacant.
FEMA Director: Vacant.
Secret Service Director: Vacant.
ICE Director: Vacant.
DHS Deputy: Vacant.
 
President: Present, but unaccounted for.

html: Today is #EqualPayDay, which means that on average, American women would have to work this far into 2019 just to make what American men made in 2018. For women of color, this date is significantly later in the year. We have to keep working toward #EqualPay.

html: This #InternationalWomensDay, we must remember that we have a responsibility to protect human rights at home and abroad. That’s why I co-sponsored the #ReproRightsAreHumanRights Act, which requires the @StateDept to reinstate #reprorights into its annual Human Rights Reports.
text: This #InternationalWomensDay, we must remember that we have a responsibility to protect human rights at home and abroad. That’s why I co-sponsored the #ReproRightsAreHumanRights Act, which requires the @StateDept to reinstate #reprorights into its annual Human Rights Reports.

html: One of the most important things I’ve learned in my career is that the institution of democracy is only as strong as the faith that people put in it. It's time for Congress to earn back the people’s trust by ensuring that every citizen has a voice in their government.
text: One of the most important things I’ve learned in my career is that the institution of democracy is only as strong as the faith that people put in it. It's time for Congress to earn back the people’s trust by ensuring that every citizen has a voice in their government.

html: You outdid yourself, #WA10! Even in the midst of #WinterStormMaya, my office received more than 11,600 valentines from local students to distribute to veterans and first responders. That’s a 2.4% increase from last year. Thanks to all who joined me in thanking our local heroes!
text:
You outdid yourself, #WA10! Even in the midst of #WinterStormMaya, my office received more than 11,600 valentines from local students to distribute to veterans and first responders. That’s a 2.4% increase from last year.

Thanks to all who joined me in thanking our local heroes!

html: We can’t afford efforts to make gun violence prevention a partisan issue. Americans demand action to #EndGunViolence. We must make the Bipartisan Background Checks Act law.https://goo.gl/8KPjtM
text: We can’t afford efforts to make gun violence prevention a partisan issue. Americans demand action to #EndGunViolence. We must make the Bipartisan Background Checks Act law.https://goo.gl/8KPjtM

html: More than 90% of Americans support universal background checks. I'm voting today to support #HR8, a bipartisan bill to #EndGunViolence and expand background checks.
text: More than 90% of Americans support universal background checks. I'm voting today to support #HR8, a bipartisan bill to #EndGunViolence and expand background checks.

html: Our current background check system has already stopped more than 3 million sales to convicted felons and other prohibited purchasers. Today, I am proud to stand with my colleagues in Congress to help save lives by passing universal background checks. #HR8
text: Our current background check system has already stopped more than 3 million sales to convicted felons and other prohibited purchasers. Today, I am proud to stand with my colleagues in Congress to help save lives by passing universal background checks. #HR8

html: Americans are 25 times more likely to be killed by a gun than people in other developed countries. We can defend the 2nd Amendment and still find that unacceptable. #EndGunViolence
text: Americans are 25 times more likely to be killed by a gun than people in other developed countries. We can defend the 2nd Amendment and still find that unacceptable. #EndGunViolence

html: Today, Congress is taking bipartisan action to keep communities safe by passing #HR8. We must #EndGunViolence because one life lost to gun violence is one too many.
text: Today, Congress is taking bipartisan action to keep communities safe by passing #HR8. We must #EndGunViolence because one life lost to gun violence is one too many.

html: Today, the House passed its biggest public lands package in decades. This package is a huge win for public lands nationwide—for one, it permanently reauthorizes the Land and Water Conservation Fund (LWCF)—but it’s also a huge win for Washington state.

html: These questions all link back to developing a growing economy that expands the pie for everyone, and I’m committed to drilling down to shape economic policies that match our economic reality.
text: These questions all link back to developing a growing economy that expands the pie for everyone, and I’m committed to drilling down to shape economic policies that match our economic reality.

html: Since entering Congress, I’ve used my position to ask the relevant questions about our economy to both Democratic and Republican Administrations. When will America get a raise? When will more Americans be able to achieve homeownership?
text: Since entering Congress, I’ve used my position to ask the relevant questions about our economy to both Democratic and Republican Administrations. When will America get a raise? When will more Americans be able to achieve homeownership?

html: Now seems like a good moment to share that I’m on Instagram! Check out some photos from the #SOTU and my guest, Jon from Puyallup: https://www.instagram.com/repdennyheck/

html: What are some of your priorities you hope to hear from President @realdonaldtrump tonight in the #SOTU? In our representative democracy, your voice is important.
text:
What are some of your priorities you hope to hear from President @realdonaldtrump tonight in the #SOTU? 

In our representative democracy, your voice is important.

html: We need to be prepared and committed to effectively combat Russian aggression through strict #sanctions and with strong #cybersecurity operations and investments.
text: We need to be prepared and committed to effectively combat Russian  aggression through strict #sanctions and with strong #cybersecurity operations and investments.

html: We also cannot make progress together if the President does not acknowledge the threat that Russia poses to Western democracies, including our own.
text: We also cannot make progress together if the President does not acknowledge the threat that Russia poses to Western democracies, including our own.

html: The #health of each and every American is also important to our country’s success. The President should provide a plan for how we can stabilize the health insurance marketplace and lower prescription drug costs, so that Americans of every age can afford good quality #healthcare.
text: The #health of each and every American is also important to our country’s success. The President should provide a plan for how we can stabilize the health insurance marketplace and lower prescription drug costs, so that Americans of every age can afford good quality #healthcare.

html: The President would also be smart to address the state of our nation’s #infrastructure. If we want to end this cycle of slow economic growth, we have to provide forward-looking federal investments in our roads, ports, bridges, stormwater systems and utilities.
text: The President would also be smart to address the state of our nation’s #infrastructure. If we want to end this cycle of slow economic growth, we have to provide forward-looking federal investments in our roads, ports, bridges, stormwater systems and utilities.

html: I've invited a guest from #WA10 to accompany me to the #SOTU His family includes a federal employee who was directly affected by the latest government shutdown. President Trump needs to remember these families when he makes decisions on bipartisan government funding bills.
text: I've invited a guest from #WA10 to accompany me to the #SOTU His family includes a federal employee who was directly affected by the latest government shutdown. President Trump needs to remember these families when he makes decisions on bipartisan government funding bills.

html: First and foremost, I want the President to express his openness to a long-term bipartisan strategy to keep the federal government open. Our union cannot be strong when families are denied timely paychecks for a hard day’s work. #TrumpShutdown
text: First and foremost, I want the President to express his openness to a long-term bipartisan strategy to keep the federal government open. Our union cannot be strong when families are denied timely paychecks for a hard day’s work. #TrumpShutdown

html: Like many of you watching at home, I have certain priorities that I hope he mentions in his #SOTU remarks.
text: Like many of you watching at home, I have certain priorities that I hope he mentions in his #SOTU remarks.

html: Tonight at 6 pm Pacific time, President Trump will give his State of the Union address. #SOTU
text: Tonight at 6 pm Pacific time, President Trump will give his State of the Union address. #SOTU

html: I’m honored to be attending the #SOTU address with my Representative @RepDennyHeck. I’m proud to represent my family and federal families everywhere who were affected by the #TrumpShutdown and serve as a reminder of the hardship Trump caused us and the country!
text: I’m honored to be attending the #SOTU address with my Representative @RepDennyHeck. I’m proud to represent my family and federal families everywhere who were affected by the #TrumpShutdown and serve as a reminder of the hardship Trump caused us and the country!

html: President George Herbert Walker Bush was our last combat veteran to serve in the highest office in the land. He was one of the finest members of the Greatest Generation, entering public service following a decorated career as a Navy pilot in World War II.

html: #OTD 40 yrs ago, President Carter signed into law the Pregnancy Discrimination Act, which prohibited discrimination on the basis of pregnancy. As we celebrate this landmark law, we must recommit ourselves to creating a society that’s supportive of mothers & mothers-to-be. #PDA40

html: Climate change is one of the most consequential issues we face as a nation, and I will not shift the burden of dealing with it to our children or grandchildren.
text: Climate change is one of the most consequential issues we face as a nation, and I will not shift the burden of dealing with it to our children or grandchildren.

html: We need to act NOW to address our changing climate and make the investments needed for a sustainable, low carbon future. I am committed to doing all I can on the federal level to achieve this.
text: We need to act NOW to address our changing climate and make the investments needed for a sustainable, low carbon future. I am committed to doing all I can on the federal level to achieve this.

html: Just got your paycheck? Is it nearly gone thanks to your rent? Housing is an ecosystem. Changes in one market produce spillover effects in other others. Rising home prices drive up rents; rising urban prices push up suburban ones. We are #MissingHomes: https://newdemocratcoalition-himes.house.gov/sites/newdemocratcoalition.house.gov/files/documents/NDC%20Missing%20Millions%20of%20Homes_Housing%20TF%20Findings%20Report_June%202018.pdf …
text:
Just got your paycheck? Is it nearly gone thanks to your rent?

Housing is an ecosystem. Changes in one market produce spillover effects in other others. Rising home prices drive up rents; rising urban prices push up suburban ones. 

We are #MissingHomes:  https://newdemocratcoalition-himes.house.gov/sites/newdemocratcoalition.house.gov/files/documents/NDC%20Missing%20Millions%20of%20Homes_Housing%20TF%20Findings%20Report_June%202018.pdf …

html: Some advice for @realDonaldTrump: If you claim to support family values, don't spearhead cruel immigration policies that break up families. If you claim to be fiscally responsible, don't concoct expensive immigration policies that do nothing to secure our borders.
text:
Some advice for @realDonaldTrump: 

If you claim to support family values, don't spearhead cruel immigration policies that break up families. 

If you claim to be fiscally responsible, don't concoct expensive immigration policies that do nothing to secure our borders.

html: Is it too much to ask that the Trump Administration think through their policies before they attempt to implement them? No one is well served by their slapdash approach to carrying out the law. No one.
text: Is it too much to ask that the Trump Administration think through their policies before they attempt to implement them? No one is well served by their slapdash approach to carrying out the law. No one.

html: There are ways to secure our borders without bankrupting American taxpayers. DHS have several other alternatives to detention and separation at their disposal.https://www.vox.com/2018/6/22/17483230/family-separation-immigration-alternatives-immigrant-detention-centers …
text: There are ways to secure our borders without bankrupting American taxpayers. DHS have several other alternatives to detention and separation at their disposal.https://www.vox.com/2018/6/22/17483230/family-separation-immigration-alternatives-immigrant-detention-centers …

html: It's not acceptable for @realDonaldTrump to swap one bad policy for another, changing out family separation for family detention. This is not a long-term solution for immigrant families nor our immigration system.
text: It's not acceptable for @realDonaldTrump to swap one bad policy for another, changing out family separation for family detention. This is not a long-term solution for immigrant families nor our immigration system.

html: Family detention hurts families and should not replace family separation. There are alternatives to family detentions that are effective, humane and cost a fraction compared to family detention.
text: Family detention hurts families and should not replace family separation. There are alternatives to family detentions that are effective, humane and cost a fraction compared to family detention.

html: The Trump administration is telling asylum-seeking families that they only have two options: family detention or family separation. This is a false choice.
text: The Trump administration is telling asylum-seeking families that they only have two options: family detention or family separation. This is a false choice.

html: According to @BLS_gov, union workers employed by state government in the U.S. earn on average 17 percent more than their non-union counterparts, and union workers employed by a local government in the U.S. earn 35 percent more than their non-union counterparts.
text: According to @BLS_gov, union workers employed by state government in the U.S. earn on average 17 percent more than their non-union counterparts, and union workers employed by a local government in the U.S. earn 35 percent more than their non-union counterparts.

html: According to @equitablegrowth, from 1980 to 2014, wages for the bottom half of income earners grew by one percent, while wages for the top one percent of earners grew by 205 percent.
text: According to @equitablegrowth, from 1980 to 2014, wages for the bottom half of income earners grew by one percent, while wages for the top one percent of earners grew by 205 percent.

html: The Supreme Court’s ruling in Janus v. AFSCME will affect 17.3 million public employees, including public school teachers, firefighters, and police officers.
text: The Supreme Court’s ruling in Janus v. AFSCME will affect 17.3 million public employees, including public school teachers, firefighters, and police officers.

html: I continue to ask those in power, when does America get a raise? As housing, health care, and everyday costs of living skyrocket, we need to do all we can to empower workers and allow them the tools to earn fair pay and benefits.
text: I continue to ask those in power, when does America get a raise? As housing, health care, and everyday costs of living skyrocket, we need to do all we can to empower workers and allow them the tools to earn fair pay and benefits.

html: In fact, we need to find ways we can attract more talent to replace a rapidly retiring public sector workforce.
text: In fact, we need to find ways we can attract more talent to replace a rapidly retiring public sector workforce.

html: When our courts make it harder for workers to advocate for fair working conditions, they hurt our public sector’s ability to attract talent. That will end up harming all of us.
text: When our courts make it harder for workers to advocate for fair working conditions, they hurt our public sector’s ability to attract talent. That will end up harming all of us.

html: This Supreme Court decision accepts the flawed position of special interests with deep pockets who are dedicated to destroying organized labor.
text: This Supreme Court decision accepts the flawed position of special interests with deep pockets who are dedicated to destroying organized labor.

html: Unions will continue to defend the rights of teachers, police officers, firefighters, and all public sector workers who serve our communities with courage and bravery every day.
text: Unions will continue to defend the rights of teachers, police officers, firefighters, and all public sector workers who serve our communities with courage and bravery every day.

html: Our district is strong and prosperous because of the public servants who educate our children, put out fires, and patrol our streets.
text: Our district is strong and prosperous because of the public servants who educate our children, put out fires, and patrol our streets.

html: I know because I was raised in a union family, and would not be where I am today without the unions of which my parents were proud members.
text: I know because I was raised in a union family, and would not be where I am today without the unions of which my parents were proud members.

html: Throughout our history, the strong voice of unions has served as a critical part of growing our economy and middle class. #JANUSvsAFSCME
text: Throughout our history, the strong voice of unions has served as a critical part of growing our economy and middle class. #JANUSvsAFSCME

html: The Voting Rights Advancement Act ensures that states with repeated voting rights violations are required to clear their election changes with the Department of Justice. That’s a commonsense voter protection to keep our elections fair #RestoreTheVOTE
text: The Voting Rights Advancement Act ensures that states with repeated voting rights violations are required to clear their election changes with the Department of Justice. That’s a commonsense voter protection to keep our elections fair #RestoreTheVOTE

html: As Justice Ginsburg said in her dissent, gutting the VRA "is like throwing away your umbrella in a rainstorm because you are not getting wet." 2/5pic.twitter.com/FkYZxcAhYx
text: As Justice Ginsburg said in her dissent, gutting the VRA "is like throwing away your umbrella in a rainstorm because you are not getting wet." 2/5pic.twitter.com/FkYZxcAhYx

html: Our democracy only works when elections are free & fair and all eligible voters are able to cast a ballot. On the anniversary of Shelby County v. Holder, it's time to #RestoreTheVOTEpic.twitter.com/fNTozq90Pi
text: Our democracy only works when elections are free & fair and all eligible voters are able to cast a ballot. On the anniversary of Shelby County v. Holder, it's time to #RestoreTheVOTEpic.twitter.com/fNTozq90Pi

html: Voting is a right, not a privilege. Five years after the Supreme Court gutted the VRA, Americans want the full freedom to vote back. It’s time to #RestoreTheVOTE.pic.twitter.com/27dp86MeEc
text: Voting is a right, not a privilege. Five years after the Supreme Court gutted the VRA, Americans want the full freedom to vote back. It’s time to #RestoreTheVOTE.pic.twitter.com/27dp86MeEc

html: 13 states have multiple voting rights violations over the past 25 years – the Voting Rights Advancement Act would ensure that they don’t enact any more election changes which are unfair to voters #RestoreTheVOTEpic.twitter.com/rVe0vgOzHN
text: 13 states have multiple voting rights violations over the past 25 years – the Voting Rights Advancement Act would ensure that they don’t enact any more election changes which are unfair to voters #RestoreTheVOTEpic.twitter.com/rVe0vgOzHN

html: There’s nothing more important than our right to vote. But 5 years after Shelby County v. Holder, that right is under attack because of gerrymandering, voter ID laws, voter purges and more. We need action to #RestoreTheVOTEpic.twitter.com/MKXZ2qaB96
text: There’s nothing more important than our right to vote. But 5 years after Shelby County v. Holder, that right is under attack because of gerrymandering, voter ID laws, voter purges and more. We need action to #RestoreTheVOTEpic.twitter.com/MKXZ2qaB96
